settings.panel_version_desc: This is useful to provide Pyro staff if you run into an unexpected issue.
settings.two_factor_error: Your account must have two-factor authentication enabled in order to continue.

password.requirements: Your new password should be at least 8 characters in length and unique to this website.

validation.at_least_8_characters: Your new password should be at least 8 characters in length.
validation.current_required: You must provide your current account password.
validation.password_required: You must provide a new password.
validation.password_mismatch: Password confirmation does not match the password you entered.

status.enabled: Your account is protected by an authenticator app.
status.disabled: You have not configured an authenticator app.

setup.title: Enable Authenticator App
setup.description: Scan the QR code above using an authenticator app, or enter the secret code above. Then, enter the 6-digit code it generates below.
setup.description_dialog: You'll be required to enter a verification code each time you sign in.

recovery.title: Authenticator App Enabled
recovery.description: Store the codes below somewhere safe. If you lose access to your authenticator app you can use these backup codes to sign in.
recovery.alert: These codes will not be shown again.

disable.title: Remove Authenticator App
disable.description: Removing your authenticator app will make your account less secure.

email.updated_successfully: Your primary email has been updated.

api_key_modal.title: Your API Key
api_key_modal.modal_desc: The API key you have requested is shown below. Please store it in a safe place, as it will not be shown again.

language.choose_language: Choose display language for the user interface.

api.delete_api_key_desc: All requests using the {{key}} key will be invalidated.
api.no_api_keys: No API keys exist for this account.
api.key_description_description: A description of this API key.
api.allowed_ips_description: Leave blank to allow any IP address to use this API key, otherwise provide each IP address on a new line.

ssh_key.name: SSH Key Name
ssh_key.name_description: A name to identify this SSH key.
ssh_key.delete_message: Removing the {name} SSH key will invalidate its usage across the Panel.

settings.sftp_password_note: Your SFTP password is the same as the password you use to access this panel.

reinstall.title: Reinstall Server
reinstall.description: Reinstalling your server will stop it, and then re-run the installation script that initially set it up. Some files may be deleted or modified during this process, please back up your data before continuing.

confirm.title: Confirm server reinstallation
confirm.description: Your server will be stopped and some files may be deleted or modified during this process, are you sure you wish to continue?

toast.reinstall_started: Your server has begun the reinstallation process.

auth.password_requirements: Passwords must be at least 8 characters in length.
auth.reset_email_info: We'll send you an email with a link to reset your password.
auth.check_device_for_code: Check device linked with your account for code.
auth.recovery_code_description: Enter one of the recovery codes generated when you setup 2-Factor authentication on this account in order to continue.
auth.two_factor_code_description: Enter the two-factor token displayed by your device.

validation.username_required: A username or email must be provided.
validation.password_min_length: Your new password should be at least 8 characters in length.
validation.password_confirmation_required: Your new password does not match.
validation.password_confirmation_mismatch: Your new password does not match.
validation.email_required_reset: Please enter your email address to reset your password.

errors.access_denied_message: You do not have permission to access this page.
errors.page_not_found_message: We couldn't find the page you were looking for. You may have lost access, or the page may have been deleted. Here are some helpful alternative links:
errors.server_error_message: An unexpected error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
errors.rendering_error: An error was encountered by the application while rendering this view. Try refreshing the page.
